body:
Hey All, Thank you for always being so prompt and helpful in all your responses. I had a question about the shading analysis.  I set up the honeybee wind analysis and it reflected difference in results as expected.  But after setting up the shade evaluation, when I try to simulate it, it does not reflect any difference in results. It also does not show any error.
I probably have missed out on entering some input correctly but I am just not able to figure out what that might be. I have attached the GH file. Thank you so much again for all your help.
  Regards, Ghosh
